Question
========

A cabinet has three drawers. Drawer one contains two gold keys; drawer two one gold and one silver, while drawer three contains two silver keys. You randomly choose a drawer and then take from it a key at random. What is the probability that you will choose a gold key? choose?

Answerlist
----------

* $\frac{1}{6}$
* $\frac{1}{3}$
* $\frac{1}{4}$
* $\frac{1}{2}$

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* $\frac{1}{6}$: Incorrect
* $\frac{1}{3}$: Incorrect
* $\frac{1}{4}$: Incorrect
* $\frac{1}{2}$: Correct
